text:
Washington DC |Virtru (https://www.virtru.com/) | Full time | On-Site or Remote |Senior/Lead QA Analyst/Release Manager

We are growing security company based in the DC area, looking to hire a QA Lead to help with our QA team. Below is a link to the job descriptions and you can apply through the link.

http://www.indeed.com/viewjob?t=seniorlead+qa+analystrelease...
